response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer at a price of $750,000. This exceptional opportunity allows you to secure this valuable asset at a considerable discount compared to its market value of $800,000. I trust this offer will enable us to reach an agreement that benefits both parties. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.", "product_price": 750000}
